'''''After the King: Stories In Honor of J.R.R. Tolkien''''', is a Festschrift anthology published to celebrate the centenary of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s birth. The book contains nineteen short stories of fantasy and science fiction, and also includes an introduction on the role of Tolkien for the genre of fantasy.
*Note: None of the short stories are set in, or directly related to, Tolkien's [[legendarium]].
==Contents==
*Introduction ([[wikipedia:Jane Yolen|Jane Yolen]])
*"Reave the Just" ([[wikipedia:Stephen R. Donaldson|Stephen R. Donaldson]])
*"Troll Bridge" ([[Terry Pratchett]])   
*"Long Night's Vigil at the Temple" ([[wikipedia:Robert Silverberg|Robert Silverberg]])
*"The Dragon of Tollin" ([[wikipedia:Elizabeth Ann Scarborough|Elizabeth Ann Scarborough]])
*"Faith" ([[Poul Anderson|Poul]] and [[wikipedia:Karen Kruse Anderson|Karen Anderson]])
*"In the Season of the Dressing of the Wells" ([[wikipedia:John Brunner (novelist)|John Brunner]])
*"The Fellowship of the Dragon" ([[wikipedia:Patricia A. McKillip|Patricia A. McKillip]])
*"Decoy Duck" ([[Harry Turtledove]])
*"Nine Threads of Gold" ([[wikipedia:Andre Norton|Andre Norton]])
*"Conjure Man" ([[Charles de Lint]]; story starts with a quote from Tolkien)
*"Silver or Gold" ([[wikipedia:Emma Bull|Emma Bull]])
*"Up the Side of the Air" ([[Karen Haber]])
*"The Naga" ([[Peter S. Beagle]])
*"Revenge of the Sugar Plum Fairies" ([[wikipedia:Mike Resnick|Mike Resnick]])
*"Winter's King" (Jane Yolen)
*"Gotterdammerung" ([[wikipedia:Barry N. Malzberg|Barry N. Malzberg]])
*"Down the River Road" ([[wikipedia:Gregory Benford|Gregory Benford]])
*"Death and the Lady" ([[wikipedia:Judith Tarr|Judith Tarr]])
*"Halfling House"([[wikipedia:Dennis L. McKiernan|Dennis McKiernan]])
